item.title: Why Aren’t Your Eye Drops Working? 5 Hidden Triggers Making Dry Eye Worse
item.description: When your eyes feel dry, you probably reach for OTC eye drops. The catch? OTC eye drops can soothe symptoms, but they don’t target the root cause.

item.title: The Overlooked Link Between Chronic Dry Eye and Your Overall Well-Being
item.description: Chronic dry eye can disrupt your quality of life—sometimes in ways you may not even be considering. What to know & how to treat it.

item.title: Dry Eye After LASIK or Vision Correction? What No One Warns You About
item.description: Getting a vision correction can be life changing. But it’s not free of potential side effects. The most common? Dry eye.

item.title: This Common Nighttime Habit May Raise Heart Disease Risk By Up To 35%
item.description: And almost all of us are guilty of this habit
